-e ---

"Taucher" "diver" doveʳ

𒌅𒆸𒄷 tu-gur₄ mušen tugur dúgva "dove" 𒌅𒋽𒄷 tu-gur₈ mušen 𒌅𒍀𒄷 tu-gur₅ mušen 𒌅𒄥𒄷 tum₁₂gur mušen 𒌅𒃷𒄷 tu-gan₂ mušen 𒌅𒃶𒄷 tu-gan mušen tugur

𒌨𒌅 TÚG-ṭuʳ TauchTier 𓅂

polyvalent completion:

𒋢𒃶𒉌𒉡 •pi-kan-ni-nu ( 𒋢 pelt ) 𒋢𒃶𒉌𒉡 pigeon

𒋢𒃶𒉌𒉡 •ṭau-ban-ni-nu 𒋢𒃶𒉌𒉡 Tauben, doves

𒋢𒃶𒉌𒉡 su-kan-ni-nu #sukannīnu 𒋢𒃶𒉌𒉡 dove, pigeon

𒋧𒈠𒌅 sum-ma-tu saeampati@Austronesian sarampati <> Malay merpati +++? 𒋧𒈠𒌅 sum-ma-tu saeampati sarampati ϭⲣⲟⲙⲡⲓ š'rompiᵗ ☑ 𒋧𒈠𒌅 sum-ma-tu saeampati sarampati •salampati 𓆈 | dove | 🕊 salam ☮ 𒋧𒈠𒌅 šum-ma-tu saeampati < •çaˡampati > columbus 𒋧𒈠𒌅 sum-ma-tu حَمَامَة ˢḥamāma™ 🕊 saeampati <> sympathy ☮ ? 𒋧𒈠𒌅 (female) dove, pigeon 𓈗 mar-patgiᵒⁿ merpati 𒊩 𒊓𒄠𒈬𒊏𒆳 Sammuramat Semiramis Σεμίραμις "beloved dove" according to greek <> šmm rmm "high heavens"

𒌨𒌅 ᵏur-ṭu® کۆتر kotir طير ṭīr 𓅂 tyw® @ ᵏur 𓊖 Tier
𒌨𒌅 TÚG-ṭu® dúgva dove (TÚG ⋍ dog ≠ Himmelsratte ) 𒌨𒌅 ur-ṭu •daš-ṭu ტორონჯი ṭoronǯi ? 𒌨𒌅 ur-ṭu urpi ( Quechua too far ) 𒌨𒌅 a dove

𒌨𒌅 ur-ṭu 𒌨𒌅 a dove <> 𒌨𒊭𒉡 ur-ša-nu 𒌨𒊭𒉡 wild dove

complement : 𓆈 | dove | ⋍ •salampati 🕊 sarampati! > columbus saeampati 𒋧𒈠𒌅 sum-ma-tu “dove” ⇔
